news_title: New Tech Park Inaugurated in Dhaka
news_details: The government has inaugurated a new technology park aimed at boosting the startup ecosystem.
A team of university students secured first place in an international robotics competition.

news_title: New Metro Rail Line Opens to Public
news_details: The newly completed metro rail line is expected to ease traffic congestion in the capital.
Local startups have raised a record amount of funding in the last quarter.
An AI-powered traffic management system has been launched to reduce congestion.
A state-of-the-art robotics lab has been opened for engineering students.
More households are switching to solar energy amid rising electricity costs.
Online shopping platforms report a significant increase in winter sales.

news_title: New Mobile App Launched for Students
news_details: A new mobile application helps students track academic progress and deadlines.
Farmers are adopting smart farming tools to improve crop yield.
A nationwide campaign has been launched to raise cyber security awareness.

news_title: Local Game Studio Releases New Indie Game
news_details: A local game development studio released a new indie title worldwide.
